description: Episode of Series "Biology Program. Unit 5. Heredity and Adaptive Change". Shows how inheritance is determined in statistically predictable ways. Presents the insights and conclusions about inheritance that were first discovered by Gregor Mendel. Suitable for upper secondary level.
